1. a particular; a certain Usually written using kana alone, Only applies to さるその製造業者は、避けられない危機を乗り切る手助けをしてくれる、金をもった、さる金融業者をみつけた。The industrialist found a wealthy financier to help him weather the storm which was inevitable.

sentences.translation: Let's have one more drink, and then I'll take you back home.

1. (not) at all; (not) in the slightest with neg. sentence「長い１日だったのでお疲れでしょう」「いいえ、全然」"You must be tired after a long day." "No, not in the least."
2. wholly; entirely; completely; totally neg. context, e.g. 全然反対あなたの作文は全然だめだというわけではない。Your composition is not altogether bad.
3. extremely; very Colloquial, pos. context, e.g. 全然いいよ

sentences.translation: "You must be tired after a long day." "No, not in the least."
Your composition is not altogether bad.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Na-adjective (keiyodoshi)
meanings.meaning: 1. natural; right; proper; just; reasonable; appropriate; deserved 彼が息子の自慢をするのは当然だ。It is only natural that he be proud of his son.
2. naturally; as a matter of course; rightly; deservedly; justly; of course ボルボ衝突したので、うちの車の方が当然ひどい目にあった。In the collision with a Volvo, our car naturally got the worst of it.
当前 【とうぜん】
当前: Ateji (phonetic) reading, Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: It is only natural that he be proud of his son.
In the collision with a Volvo, our car naturally got the worst of it.
